summary.p: This module requires the service of mod_proxy. It provides support for the FastCGI protocol.
Thus, in order to get the ability of handling the FastCGI protocol, mod_proxy and mod_proxy_fcgi have to be present in the server.
Unlike mod_fcgid or mod_fastcgi, mod_proxy_fcgi has no provision for starting the application process; fcgistarter is provided for that purpose.

note.title: Warning
note.p: Do not enable proxying until you have secured your server. Open proxy servers are dangerous both to your network and to the Internet at large.

section.title: Examples
section.p: Remember, in order to make the following examples work, you have to enable mod_proxy and mod_proxy_fcgi.

The balanced gateway needs mod_proxy_balancer and at least one load balancer algorithm module, such as mod_lbmethod_byrequests, in addition to the proxy modules listed above. mod_lbmethod_byrequests is the default.
section.example:
Balanced gateway ProxyPass /myapp/ balancer://myappcluster/
<Proxy balancer://myappcluster/>
BalancerMember fcgi://localhost:4000/
BalancerMember fcgi://localhost:4001/
</Proxy>
